foray.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a short attempt at doing a particular job or activity, especially one that is very different from what you usually do
foray.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: It will be my first foray into local government.
Wright is about to make his first foray into the music business.
foray.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: a short sudden attack by a group of soldiers, especially in order to get food or supplies
foray.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: their nightly forays into enemy territory
foray.translation[0].definitions[2].defi: a short journey somewhere in order to get something or do something
foray.translation[0].definitions[2].exam: We make regular forays to France to buy wine.
